stories.title: The Ship Before The Beginning
stories.intended_reader: Cruise enthusiasts interested in early fleet history
stories.core_insight: SS Meridian served Celebrity before the line found its identity
stories.markdown:
**Before Horizon, before Celebrity found its voice, there was Meridian.**

[SS Meridian](/ships/celebrity-cruises/ss-meridian.html) was an older vessel that served Celebrity Cruises during the line's earliest experimental phase. Built in 1963 as the Galileo Galilei for Italian Line, she joined Celebrity in 1990.

Meridian served Bermuda routes, providing Celebrity with Caribbean presence while the line defined what it would become. She was bridge between Celebrity's corporate launch and the Horizon-class ships that would establish the brand.

The ship was neither new nor revolutionary. She was practicalâ€”providing capacity while Celebrity invested in the ships that would define its future.

**The truth:** Meridian represents Celebrity's earliest days, before the line discovered what it would become. A transitional ship serving transitional purposes.

Those who sailed Meridian witnessed Celebrity's infancy. The ship before the beginning.

stories.title: Meridian's Bermuda Service
stories.intended_reader: History enthusiasts interested in early cruise routes
stories.markdown:
**Meridian served Bermuda before Celebrity had modern ships.**

[SS Meridian](/ships/celebrity-cruises/ss-meridian.html) worked New York to Bermuda routes, providing Celebrity with presence in a premium market while the line built its identity.

The pink sand beaches. The British colonial charm. The overnight stays that would become Celebrity's Bermuda signature. Meridian pioneered the routes that modern ships now perfect.

'This isn't what Celebrity will always look like,' passengers could have observed.

'This is Celebrity while Celebrity figures out who it is,' would have been accurate.

**The truth:** Meridian's Bermuda service established the route. The ship has long departed, but the Bermuda relationship began here.

Those who sailed Meridian to Bermuda witnessed the route's origin. The foundation of a lasting relationship.
